ProductAvailabilityProjection.name: ProductAvailabilityProjection
ProductAvailabilityProjection.description: Represents the projected product quantity available at an inventory location at various points in time. Records for this object are automatically created by Intelligent Sales.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Product2Id.description: The product whose quantity is available quantity is projected.

ProductLocationId.description: The inventory location of the product with that quantity.

ProjectedQuantity.description: The quantity projected at the inventory for the specified date.

ProjectionDate.description: The date for when the quantity projection is applicable.

Status.description: The status of the inventory based on the projected quantity and the required quantity for that day.
